A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed the film. Just like every Star Wars film\, there were parts I did not enjoy. But overall the film is excellent. Don't listen to the haters. They spent 2 years building up a story in their heads at what they thought this movie would be- and got whiney and upset that it didn't meet what they had created in their mind. It is a gold Star Wars film. Better than any of the prequels (1-3). There are several scenes that are just incredible. It has the best fight scene in any Star Wars film. It's good. Go see it. Ignore the haters and decide for yourself.
